Selfadministered Beck Depression Inventory II scale total score great 9 , suicide question score zero . Able read , comprehend record information . A signed date write informed consent obtain subject . The physician responsible considers subject unfit study base upon medical history , physical examination psychiatric history evaluation . Exposure four new chemical entity within 12 month prior first dose day . A screen ECG outside range specify protocol Pulse rate < 55 > 100 bpm OR systolic blood pressure > 140 < 100 OR diastolic blood pressure > 90 < 60 . Subjects fall within normal reference range may include within study opinion Principal Investigator Medical Monitor compromise subject . History regular alcohol consumption average > 14 drinks/week men . One drink equivalent ( 12 g alcohol ) = 5 ounce ( 150 ml ) wine 12 ounce ( 360 ml ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45 ml ) 80 proof distil spirit ) within 6 month screen . Smokes smoke last 6 month . Any previous current psychiatric diagnosis list DSMIV Axis I II . Any history suicidal attempt , suicidal ideation behaviour .
